name: MineCart Rail Rusher War Chase-Mine Survival Story
name_original: MineCart Rail Rusher War Chase-Mine Survival Story
description:
Dungeon Guardian Monster Run challenges your reflexes to rush them control a rail cart onto the railway tracks to collect lots of coins, gems and wonders around the city of luck


The Dungeon Guardian Runner has jumped onto the rail cart facing the most epic adventure of monster run games. Begins with a frenzy journey by accelerating insanely fast on rail tracks, tilt and swipe is the only way to avoid obstacles.


This monster run becomes more challenging when on his way, he confronts starving wolves on the railway line waiting for some livestock. The Dungeon Guardian will have a sword to defend himself from obstacles and wolves attack.


Keep him continue his exciting journey, collect coins, and gems!


Your destination is undefined! Jump into the rail cart to take you to the deadly tracks set around the city. Your Monster run will be fusion of both excitement mashed into danger. Deal with your fast reflexes to win over underlying danger on these rail tracks.


Ready for an Extreme Monster Run


Dungeon Guardian relies on players’ reaction time, judgment skills and monster run power. The Objective of the game is to collect coins, and gems all the way avoiding obstacles and killing wolves by shadow blade! Force your reflexes to race through the city while collecting dash coins around.


Challenge your reflexes while swiping and collecting rail cart on runner rail tracks. Make your way through parallel rail tracks taking you to an endless journey filled with lots of hidden and open rewards waiting to be collect.


DUNGEON GUARDIAN FEATURES


In game bonuses and power ups

Eye candy city suburbs environment

Time challenging gameplay

Smooth screen transition with every movement
